name: part_007
file: tmp_【3D Live】KOBO BABY PARTY !!!! GUGU GAGA BABU BABU ？？？!!! #Kobo3rdAnniversary [SSuRtcLXA0s]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Mori Calliope and Kobo Kanaeru discuss Kobo's 'baby curse' and her training to become an idol to break it.
Performance of the song 'Maru Maru Mori Mori!'.
Post-performance discussion, checking if the curse has been lifted.

subtitles.original: Okay okay, I see. You're in training
subtitles.english: Okay okay, I see. You're in training

subtitles.original: so that you can be an idol so that you can talk normally.
subtitles.english: so that you can be an idol so that you can talk normally.

subtitles.original: Gugu gaga...
subtitles.english: Gugu gaga...

subtitles.original: Naruhodo, okay. So you can still dance
subtitles.english: I see, okay. So you can still dance

subtitles.original: and like sing just fine, but no talking?
subtitles.english: and like sing just fine, but no talking?

subtitles.original: Ah... gugu...
subtitles.english: Ah... gugu...

subtitles.original: Oh... okay. Well, maybe you need to perform with Dada?
subtitles.english: Oh... okay. Well, maybe you need to perform with Dada?

subtitles.english: Dada... ts-ts-dada...

subtitles.original: Oh, okay, okay. Say... Dada.
subtitles.english: Oh, okay, okay. Say... Dada.

subtitles.original: Ts... na... tsu...
subtitles.english: Ts... na... tsu...

subtitles.original: Okay, all right, all right. You know what?
subtitles.english: Okay, all right, all right. You know what?

subtitles.english: Let's just... let's take it slow, okay?

subtitles.original: Ah... gugu gaga...
subtitles.english: Ah... gugu gaga...

subtitles.original: マル・マル・モリ・モリ！ Lyrics, Music: 宮下浩司
subtitles.english: Maru Maru Mori Mori! Lyrics, Music: Koji Miyashita

subtitles.original: マル・マル・モリ・モリ！ みんな食べるよ
subtitles.english: Maru Maru Mori Mori! Everyone's gonna eat!

subtitles.original: ツル・ツル・テカ・テカ 明日も 入るかな？
subtitles.english: Slippery, shiny, will it fit tomorrow too?

subtitles.original: ダバ・ダバ・デュ・ア ダバ・ダバ・デュ・ア
subtitles.english: Daba daba du a, daba daba du a

subtitles.original: 大きくなったらお空に声が届くかな
subtitles.english: When I grow up, I wonder if my voice will reach the sky

subtitles.original: いつまででも一緒だよ
subtitles.english: We'll be together forever

subtitles.original: マル・マル・モリ・モリ！ みんな食べるよ
subtitles.english: Maru Maru Mori Mori! Everyone's gonna eat!

subtitles.original: ツル・ツル・テカ・テカ 明日も 入るかな？
subtitles.english: Slippery, shiny, will it fit tomorrow too?

subtitles.original: 悲しくて 泣いていた ひとり歩く 帰り道
subtitles.english: I was sad and crying, walking home alone

subtitles.original: こんな時 ほんわかな みんなに会いたいな
subtitles.english: At a time like this, I want to see everyone who makes me feel warm

subtitles.original: マル・マル・モリ・モリ おまじないだよ
subtitles.english: Maru Maru Mori Mori, it's a magic spell

subtitles.original: ツル・ツル・テカ・テカ にっこり笑顔
subtitles.english: Slippery, shiny, a beaming smile

subtitles.original: いちにのさんしで ごましおさん
subtitles.english: One, two, three, four, sesame salt!

subtitles.original: たくさんだとおいしいね
subtitles.english: It's delicious with a lot of it, isn't it?

subtitles.original: マル・マル・モリ・モリ プカプカお風呂
subtitles.english: Maru Maru Mori Mori, floating in the bath

subtitles.original: ツル・ツル・ピカ・ピカ ゴシゴシブラシ
subtitles.english: Slippery, sparkling, scrubbing with a brush

subtitles.original: 皆さん今晩は また明日
subtitles.english: Good evening everyone, see you tomorrow!

subtitles.original: 朝ご飯は何でしょうね？
subtitles.english: I wonder what's for breakfast?

subtitles.original: ダバ・ダバ・デュ・ア ダバ・ダバ・デュ・ア
subtitles.english: Daba daba du a, daba daba du a

subtitles.original: 大人になっても 虹色の夢を描こうね
subtitles.english: Even when we grow up, let's draw rainbow-colored dreams

subtitles.original: 指切りして テレリンコ
subtitles.english: Pinky swear, tererinko

subtitles.original: お星様 綺麗だね 手を繋いで 願い事
subtitles.english: The stars are beautiful, aren't they? Holding hands and making a wish

subtitles.original: たとえ遠くにいても 心は一つだよ
subtitles.english: Even if we're far apart, our hearts are one

subtitles.original: マル・マル・モリ・モリ 幸せ元気
subtitles.english: Maru Maru Mori Mori, happy and energetic

subtitles.original: テク・テク・トコ・トコ 前に進むよ
subtitles.english: Walking along, step by step, moving forward

subtitles.original: いちにのさんしで ホームラン
subtitles.english: One, two, three, four, home run!

subtitles.original: 愛がいっぱいランドセル
subtitles.english: A backpack full of love

subtitles.original: マル・マル・モリ・モリ 大きくなるよ
subtitles.english: Maru Maru Mori Mori, I'm going to grow up

subtitles.original: ドキ・ドキ・ワク・ワク ドアを開けるよ
subtitles.english: Pounding heart, exciting, I'm opening the door

subtitles.original: 皆さんしっかり また明日
subtitles.english: Everyone stay strong, see you tomorrow!

subtitles.original: もっと素敵な日になる
subtitles.english: It'll be an even more wonderful day

subtitles.original: Dada! Anjing!
subtitles.english: Dada! Anjing!

subtitles.original: Oh yeah, you like anjing too? That's nice.
subtitles.english: Oh yeah, you like anjing too? That's nice.

subtitles.original: 大好きだよ
